about_the_game:
Some people say that Twiggles are extremely shy and don’t interact with humans. But that’s not true! There is one secret to communicating with those mysterious, little creatures: They really like bananas! If you wiggle a banana in front of them, they move towards it. Your goal is to help the Twiggles collect all the stars in their little world.

Enter the unique 3D world of the Twiggles and solve all their mind-blowing, head-scratching puzzles. When you're ready, unleash your creativity, design your own puzzles and share them with the community. If other players love your puzzles and give them high ratings, you earn points and level up. Blow the mind of all your friends, climb up the ladder and become a brain-twisting VR puzzle design superstar!

name: The Twiggles VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: A 3D puzzle game designed specifically for VR. Immerse yourself in the unique world of the Twiggles and enjoy hours of mind-blowing, brain-twisting, puzzle-solving fun. Get creative and design your own puzzles with the built-in VR editor and earn points for twisting the brains of your friends.
